Strings.Text: Will you take\nthe {color 1}{string 0}{color 0}?{s}{s}{s}{s}{s}{s}{branch 0}
You can't carry any\nmore items.\n
It's already loaded.\n
You can't combine\nanymore.\n
BOTU \n
You can't use ammo \nby itself.\n
You've taken\nthe {color 1}{string 0}{color 0}.
I don't need to use \nthis right now.\n

Normal ammo and 
enhanced ammo 
cannot be loaded {clear 0}together.

cause the 
unexploded mines{clear 0}to disappear.
OK to proceed?

in the cartridge.

BOTU \n

Will you create the \nenhanced ammo?\n{s}{s}{s}{s}{s}{s}{branch 0}
There's no F. Aid \nSpray stock.\n
BOTU \n
\n
Dagger knife for\nself-defense.\n

SIGPRO SP2009
It's mainly made 
of plastic and is {clear 0}very light.
It uses 9mm
parabellum rounds.

M92F Custom.
A custom handgun
made for ＳＴＡＲＳ{clear 0}It uses 9mm
parabellum rounds.

Benelli M3S.
An easy to carry
sawed-off shotgun.{clear 0}It uses 12 gauge
shot shells.

S&W M629C.
A large stainless
steel revolver.{clear 0}A classic type 
equipped with 
weights to reduce {clear 0}the recoil.
It uses .44 Magnum 
bullets.

Hk-p Grenade 
Launcher. A small 
size grenade {clear 0}launcher developed 
for police use. {clear 0}It is loaded with 
burst rounds.

Hk-p Grenade 
Launcher. A small 
size grenade {clear 0}launcher developed 
for police use. {clear 0}It is loaded with 
flame rounds.

Hk-p Grenade 
Launcher. A small 
size grenade {clear 0}launcher developed 
for police use. {clear 0}It is loaded with 
acid rounds.

Hk-p Grenade 
Launcher. A small 
size grenade {clear 0}launcher developed 
for police use. {clear 0}It is loaded
with freeze rounds.

M66 Rocket 
Launcher. {clear 0}An old but powerful
weapon.

A powerful weapon 
that enables you to 
scatter bullets {clear 0}with single trigger 
action.

A prototype weapon 
made by Umbrella's 
armament dept.{clear 0}It uses special 
bullets equipped 
with a sensor.

STI EAGLE 6.0.
A custom made gun 
for competitions.{clear 0}It uses 9mm
parabellum rounds.

M4A1 assault rifle.
The gun is set in 
MANUAL mode.{clear 0}It uses 5.56mm 
NATO rounds.

M4A1 assault rifle.
The gun is set in 
AUTO mode.{clear 0}It uses 5.56mm 
NATO rounds.

Western Custom M37.
Equipped with a
special reload {clear 0}system and is 
effective for 
close range battle. {clear 0}It uses 12 gauge 
shot shells.

Enhanced SIGPRO.{clear 0}It is loaded with 
enhanced 9mm 
parabellum rounds.

Enhanced M92F 
Custom.{clear 0}It is loaded with 
enhanced 9mm 
parabellum rounds.
Enhanced Shotgun.{clear 0}It is loaded with\nenhanced shells.\n

A mine thrower 
loaded with special 
bullets that have {clear 0}auto-trace feature.

9x19 parabellum
rounds.{clear 0}Used for either the 
M92FS Custom or the 
SIGPRO.

.44 Magnum rounds.

for the revolver.{clear 0}Used for S&W 
M629C.

Shot Shells.
Used for 
Benelli M3S.

Grenade Burst 
Rounds. {clear 0}Standard bullets 
that scatter 
fragments when {clear 0}they hit the 
target. {clear 0}Used for Hk-p 
Grenade Launcher.

Grenade Flame 
Rounds.{clear 0}Special bullets 
whose warhead is 
filled with {clear 0}powerful napalm 
gel. {clear 0}Used for Hk-p 
Grenade Launcher.

Grenade Acid 
Rounds.{clear 0}Special bullets 
whose warhead is 
filled with anti{clear 0}-creature sulfuric 
acid.{clear 0}Used for Hk-p 
Grenade Launcher.

Grenade Freeze 
Rounds.{clear 0}Special bullets 
whose warhead is 
filled with ultra {clear 0}low temperature 
liquid nitrogen. {clear 0}Used for Hk-p 
Grenade Launcher.

Special bullets 
that burst if 
anyone other than {clear 0}the user approaches, 
thanks to the 
equipped sensor.{clear 0}Used for Mine 
Thrower.

5.56mm NATO 
rounds. Army 
bullets for the {clear 0}assault rifle.
Used for M4A1.

9mm parabellum 
rounds added with 
powerful powder {clear 0}created with the

shells added with

completely restore 
your vitality.

An old style 
battery. It seems 
to be as powerful {clear 0}as a modern one.

Its edge is in the 
shape of a hook.{clear 0}It must be used to 
hook something.

A large capacity 
power cable for 
use with large {clear 0}machinery.

high power supply 
to be used for {clear 0}large size 
machinery.
BOTU\n

Adding this to the 
machine oil turns 
it into the ideal {clear 0}oil for use with 
large size 
machinery.

kind is inside 
the card case.

An ID card for 
ＳＴＡＲＳ with Brad's 
picture on it.

machines. It can't 
be used for the {clear 0}large size 
machinery by 
itself.

Oil mixed with the 
oil additive. It 
can be used for {clear 0}the power source 
of the large size 
machinery.
BOTU\n

An instrument to 
wrench hex-shaped 
objects or bolts.

An iron pipe for 
gas piping. It's 
tough and long {clear 0}enough to be used 
as a pry.
BOTU\n

A hose to be 
connected to a 
fire hydrant.

A portable tape 
recorder.{clear 0}A patient's 
diagnosis is 
recorded onto here.
It's fuel for a \nlighter.\n

It has no oil left 
and cannot be used 
by itself.
An oil lighter.\n
An emerald shining \nin green.\n
A sapphire shining \nin blue.\n
A ball made of \namber.\n

compass.{clear 0}It says ‟Future in

used to make 
vaccine. It needs {clear 0}to be mixed with

create the vaccine.

vaccine.{clear 0}It needs to be

vaccine medium.

rusted.

to it.{clear 0}It says ‟Rear Gate”

A plastic card 
engraved with an ID 
is attached to it.{clear 0}It seems to be

kind of special {clear 0}painting.

The plastic card 
is radiating. {clear 0}It seems to show

pattern.
It's a key for an\nuptown boutique.\n

progress with this 
if I use it with a {clear 0}typewriter.
